
                            
                            <p>照着抄都抄不好 <br> 淘宝往下拉看详情页的时候，下单页内容会简化并缩小，占页面横向1/3 <br> 京东是直接把下单页原封不动地飘下来，两边占的差不多，整的跟双列浏览似的 <br> 有些细节东西，真是差远了，公司也不差钱，就不能请个专业点的 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/013024tj6evm00ff1lzfxv.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/013024tj6evm00ff1lzfxv.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/013058rfqtvbh8llt8s5yr.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/013058rfqtvbh8llt8s5yr.jpg"> </p>
